name: DeadEye Defender
description:
DESCRIPTION

DeadeyeDefender is a Survival based,Defence game wherein the player needs to hold out against an entire army of soldiers till the King's legion arrives.

You are a fabled archer capable of whittling down enemies from afar and devastating them with an array of powerful spells that compliment your skill-set.

 

Hold your Ground.

GAME MECHANICS

DeadEye Defender is a Touch based-Physics game.The player will have to touch and drag anywhere on the screen to control the bow and manipulate the power of the draw.Lift the finger to release the arrow in the appropriate trajectory controlled with real time physics.The spell icons can be touched to be activated and functions in tandem with the base controls.

Different Spells can be purchased Upgraded ,using currency obtained from slaying your enemies, to add variation to game play styles and increased survivability.

  • Touch and drag to manipulate Bow Angle and String Draw Power.

  • Release finger to release the arrow.

  • Touch the Spell Icons to activate them.
